user_query: I'm planning a road trip with my friends and we want to keep the journey lighthearted. Can you suggest some funny jokes and memes to share during the trip? Also, find us a campground with recreational activities and a nearby restaurant for meals.

TaskList.description: Search for funny jokes and memes suitable for sharing during a road trip.
Find a campground with recreational activities.
Locate a nearby restaurant for meals adjacent to the selected campground.
